message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and importance to you, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time, you can acquire this exceptional product for $10,000. This price reflects the significant discount compared to its true worth of $12,000, aiming to make it more accessible to you while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.
